summary: This document is an email chain regarding a special authorization request for a nationwide security camera system upgrade (Nice Vision or similar) for the Bureau of Prisons (BOP). It includes a correction to remove a condition about not connecting to BOPNet and clarifies procurement requirements.

events.title: Special Authorization Request Submission
events.description: A special authorization request for a nationwide security camera system upgrade for the Bureau of Prisons was submitted.

events.title: Corrected Authorization Memo Forwarded
events.description: A corrected memo for the special authorization request was forwarded, with revisions to remove a connectivity restriction and clarify procurement rules.

keyFacts: The Bureau of Prisons (BOP) sought a special authorization for a nationwide security camera system upgrade using Nice Vision or similar technology.
A correction was made to the authorization memo, removing a condition that the system not connect to BOPNet.
The correction also clarified that the camera system purchase should be for either Approved Hardware or FITARA-approved items.
The special authorization was intended to replace individual approvals for each BOP institution.
